text: ยง 17-120 Orders for paving, et cetera, yards and cellars; notice. An order for the paving, filling, concreting, draining or regulating of any yards or cellars within the city shall be made by the department only upon reasonable notice to the owner or agent thereof.

chapter.text: DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND MENTAL HYGIENE

heading.catch_text: Orders for paving, et cetera, yards and cellars; notice.
